00095 #include "nsCOMPtr.h"
00096 #include "nsIComponentManager.h"
00097 #include "nsICategoryManager.h"
00098 #include "nsIServiceManager.h"
00099 #include "nsStringGlue.h"
00100 #include "nsXPCOMCID.h"
00101 
00102 class nsIFile;
00103 struct nsModuleComponentInfo;
00104 
00105 #define SB_DEVICE_CONTROLLER_CATEGORY "songbird-device-controller"
00106 
00128 #define SB_DEVICE_CONTROLLER_REGISTERSELF(_name)                               \
00129                                                                                \
00130   static NS_METHOD _name##RegisterSelf(nsIComponentManager* aCompMgr,          \
00131                                        nsIFile* aPath,                         \
00132                                        const char* registryLocation,           \
00133                                        const char* componentType,              \
00134                                        const nsModuleComponentInfo* info);     \
00135                                                                                \
00136   static NS_METHOD _name##UnregisterSelf(nsIComponentManager* aCompMgr,        \
00137                                          nsIFile* aPath,                       \
00138                                          const char* registryLocation,         \
00139                                          const nsModuleComponentInfo* info)
00140 
00144 #define SB_DEVICE_CONTROLLER_REGISTERSELF_IMPL(_name)                          \
00145                                                                                \
00146   NS_METHOD                                                                    \
00147   _name##RegisterSelf(nsIComponentManager* aCompMgr,                           \
00148                       nsIFile* aPath,                                          \
00149                       const char* registryLocation,                            \
00150                       const char* componentType,                               \
00151                       const nsModuleComponentInfo* info)                       \
00152   {                                                                            \
00153     nsresult rv;                                                               \
00154     nsCOMPtr<nsICategoryManager> catMan =                                      \
00155       do_GetService(NS_CATEGORYMANAGER_CONTRACTID, &rv);                       \
00156     NS_ENSURE_SUCCESS(rv, rv);                                                 \
00157     nsID id;                                                                   \
00158     rv = this->GetIdInPlace(&id);                                              \
00159     NS_ENSURE_SUCCESS(rv, rv);                                                 \
00160     nsCAutoString idString(id.ToString());                                     \
00161     NS_ENSURE_STATE(!idString.IsEmpty());                                      \
00162     nsXPIDLCString prevEntry;                                                  \
00163     rv = catMan->AddCategoryEntry(SB_DEVICE_CONTROLLER_CATEGORY,               \
00164                                   idString.get(),                              \
00165                                   info->mContractID,                           \
00166                                   PR_TRUE, PR_TRUE,                            \
00167                                   getter_Copies(prevEntry));                   \
00168     NS_ENSURE_SUCCESS(rv, rv);                                                 \
00169     NS_WARN_IF_FALSE(prevEntry.IsEmpty(),                                      \
00170                      "Another controller was registered with that id!");       \
00171     return NS_OK;                                                              \
00172   }                                                                            \
00173                                                                                \
00174   NS_METHOD                                                                    \
00175   _name##UnregisterSelf(nsIComponentManager* aCompMgr,                         \
00176                         nsIFile* aPath,                                        \
00177                         const char* registryLocation,                          \
00178                         const nsModuleComponentInfo* info)                     \
00179   {                                                                            \
00180     nsresult rv;                                                               \
00181     nsCOMPtr<nsICategoryManager> catMan =                                      \
00182       do_GetService(NS_CATEGORYMANAGER_CONTRACTID, &rv);                       \
00183     NS_ENSURE_SUCCESS(rv, rv);                                                 \
00184     nsID id;                                                                   \
00185     rv = this->GetIdInPlace(&id);                                              \
00186     NS_ENSURE_SUCCESS(rv, rv);                                                 \
00187     nsCAutoString idString(id.ToString());                                     \
00188     NS_ENSURE_STATE(!idString.IsEmpty());                                      \
00189     rv = catMan->DeleteCategoryEntry(SB_DEVICE_CONTROLLER_CATEGORY,            \
00190                                      idString.get(),                           \
00191                                      PR_TRUE);                                 \
00192     NS_ENSURE_SUCCESS(rv, rv);                                                 \
00193     return NS_OK;                                                              \
00194   }
